game.name: Saints Row: The Third - Special Ops Vehicle Pack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A collection of fully equipped military vehicles for your garage. The Saints VTOL features jet and hover modes making airborne attacks easy and stylish. The Saints Tank and the Saints N-Forcer are the ultimate in armored warfare, showing your opponents the Saints aren't to be messed with.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A collection of fully equipped military vehicles for your garage. The Saints VTOL features jet and hover modes making airborne attacks easy and stylish. The Saints Tank and the Saints N-Forcer are the ultimate in armored warfare, showing your opponents the Saints aren't to be messed with.
